title: What Alex Wants He Gets
description: Part 1 of the Alex and Harper DuetI thought one night would be enough, but I was wrong.HarperAn anonymous invitation, sex with strangers... What was I thinking?Hell yeah. I need to get a life. That's what I was thinking.But I didn't plan on getting addicted.AlexI knew she wouldn’t say no. No one ever does.I have more in my life than any one man should. Money that can literally buy anything I want, enough power to control a city of millions, and a long line of willing women to fulfill every twisted deviant desire I can dream up.My life is exactly how I want it.Until she stumbles into my perfect world.An innocent that I have no business corrupting. Except that’s all I want. And what I want, I always get.I just have to figure out what her heart’s desire is and turn it into something she can’t resist.I want, no NEED, to own her—body and soul.
author: E.M. Gayle
